alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wakulla and Leon Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Comm College, or 8 miles southwest of Tallahassee, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Belair, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres, Andrew, Chaires Crossroads and Maclay State Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
